[[חֵיקִי]] 1Ki 3:20, Ps 89:51; [[חֵקִי]] Job 19:27 etc.; elsewh. alw. plene c. sf.; [[חוקף]] Kt Ps 74:11 (Qr [[חֵיקְךָ]]);—bosom, specif.

of fold of garment, at breast Ex 4:6, Ex 4:6, Ex 4:7, Ex 4:7, Ex 4:7 (all J), Pr 6:27, Pr 16:33, metaph. of ´[[י]] Ps 74:11; ´[[שׁׂחַד בח]] Pr 21:14 is a hidden reward (concealed in bosom; ‖[[מַתָּן בַּסֵּתֶר]]); [[שׁׂחַד טֵחֵק]] Pr 17:23 is a gift secretly given; fig., requite into bosom Is 65:6, Is 65:7, Ps 35:13, Ps 79:12, Je 32:18.

carry ([[נָשָׂא]]) in bosom, Moses the people Nu 11:12 (JE); Naomi, Ruth's child Ru 4:16, cf. 1Ki 3:20, 1Ki 3:20, 1Ki 17:19; ewe lamb 2Sa 12:3, Is 40:11 (metaph.); La 2:12 of infants dying in their mothers' arms; fig. of carrying insults in one's bosom Ps 89:51 (rd. prob. [[כְּלִמַּת]] for [[כּׂל]], v. Bi Che).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: external, lie in bosom, of wife [[שׁככת]] Mic 7:5, cf. 2Sa 12:8; concubine Ge 16:5 (J) cf. 1Ki 1:2; ([[ך]])[[אֵשֶׁח חיק]] De 13:7 De 28:54, cf. also Pr 5:20 [[תְּחַבֵּק חֵק נָכְּרִיׇה]]; [[אׂישׁ חֵיקָהּ]] De 28:56.

definitions.title: b.

[[בְּחֵקִי]] for [[מֵחֻקִּי]], so LXX Vulgate 0l Me Stu Di) in my breast have I hidden the words of his mouth (cf.
